jyotirlingas.name: Somnath
jyotirlingas.importance: Somnath is considered the first among the twelve Jyotirlinga shrines of Lord Shiva. It holds great religious significance and has a rich historical background.

jyotirlingas.name: Mallikarjuna
jyotirlingas.importance: Mallikarjuna Jyotirlinga is located on the Srisailam mountain. It is associated with various myths and legends, making it a sacred pilgrimage site for devotees.

jyotirlingas.name: Mahakaleshwar
jyotirlingas.importance: Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga is situated in Ujjain and is known for its unique idol of Lord Shiva facing southward. It holds cultural and religious significance.

jyotirlingas.name: Omkareshwar
jyotirlingas.importance: Omkareshwar, located on an island in the Narmada River, is associated with various legends and is considered a symbol of spiritual beauty.

jyotirlingas.name: Kedarnath
jyotirlingas.importance: Kedarnath is one of the holiest Hindu shrines and is part of the Chota Char Dham Yatra. It holds great religious and mythological significance.

jyotirlingas.name: Bhimashankar
jyotirlingas.importance: Bhimashankar Jyotirlinga is associated with the legend of Lord Shiva defeating the demon Bhima. It is nestled in the Sahyadri range.

jyotirlingas.name: Kashi Vishwanath
jyotirlingas.importance: Kashi Vishwanath Jyotirlinga is situated in Varanasi, one of the oldest cities in the world. It is a major pilgrimage site for Shiva devotees.

jyotirlingas.name: Trimbakeshwar
jyotirlingas.importance: Trimbakeshwar is located near Nashik and is associated with the origin of the Godavari River. It is a sacred place for Kumbh Mela.

jyotirlingas.name: Vaidyanath (Deoghar)
jyotirlingas.importance: Vaidyanath Jyotirlinga, also known as Vaijnath, is located in Deoghar. It is believed to be a place where Lord Shiva relieved Ravana of his pain.

jyotirlingas.name: Nageshwar (Dwarka)
jyotirlingas.importance: Nageshwar Jyotirlinga is located near Dwarka in Gujarat. It is associated with the story of the demon Daruka and holds historical and mythological significance.

jyotirlingas.name: Rameshwar (Rameswaram)
jyotirlingas.importance: Rameshwar Jyotirlinga is situated in Rameswaram and is associated with the Ramayana. It is one of the Char Dham Yatra destinations.

jyotirlingas.name: Grishneshwar
jyotirlingas.importance: Grishneshwar Jyotirlinga is located near Ellora Caves and is associated with the legend of a devout woman named Kusuma. It holds religious significance.
